text:
e="preserve">Angelo Caroli (7 April 1937 – 17 November 2020) was an Italian professional football player, journalist and author. As a journalist, he worked for "Tuttosport". He also wrote novels. Caroli was born in L'Aquila, Italy.
His football career lasted from 1955 to 1963. He played for Juventus, Catania, Lucchese, Pordenone and Lecco.
On 17 November 2020, Caroli died at the age of 83 in Torino, Italy.
